title: Top 10 trending phones of week 3
description: With two days until the first Galaxy Unpacked event of the year our trending chart is experiencing the proverbial calm before the storm. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra's specs page, containing all the rumors we have yet, is still the most popular on our website and the Poco X7 Pro retained its second place. [#InlinePriceWidget, 13582, 1#] The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ slipped to fifth, allowing the Galaxy A55 to add one more podium spot to its legacy. Galaxy S24 Ultra rose to fourth, undoubtedly boosted by the many comparisons you guys are doing to its successor. Newly announced Realme...
excerpt: A few changes now, but more will certainly come next week. With two days until the first Galaxy Unpacked event of the year our trending chart is...
text: With two days until the first Galaxy Unpacked event of the year our trending chart is experiencing the proverbial calm before the storm. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra's specs page, containing all the rumors we have yet, is still the most popular on our website and the Poco X7 Pro retained its second place. Xiaomi Poco X7 Pro These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales. 256GB 8GB RAM$ 369.42£ 309.00512GB 12GB RAM$ 422.65£ 349.00Show all prices The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ slipped to fifth, allowing the Galaxy A55 to add one more podium spot to its legacy. Galaxy S24 Ultra rose to fourth, undoubtedly boosted by the many comparisons you guys are doing to its successor. Newly announced Realme 14 Pro+ got sixth with the iPhone 16 Pro Max climbing three spots to place seventh this time around. The outgoing Redmi Note 13 Pro is up to eighth as the hype around the OnePlus 13 cooled down a bit and it finds itself in ninth this week. The Samsung Galaxy A16 completes this edition of the chart, but we are certainly expecting some major changes next week as the new Galaxy S series makes its official debut.
html:
With two days until the first Galaxy Unpacked event of the year our trending chart is experiencing the proverbial calm before the storm.

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra's specs page, containing all the rumors we have yet, is still the most popular on our website and the Poco X7 Pro retained its second place.

Xiaomi Poco X7 Pro

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
256GB 8GB RAM$ 369.42£ 309.00
512GB 12GB RAM$ 422.65£ 349.00
Show all prices

The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ slipped to fifth, allowing the Galaxy A55 to add one more podium spot to its legacy.

Galaxy S24 Ultra rose to fourth, undoubtedly boosted by the many comparisons you guys are doing to its successor.

Newly announced Realme 14 Pro+ got sixth with the iPhone 16 Pro Max climbing three spots to place seventh this time around.

The outgoing Redmi Note 13 Pro is up to eighth as the hype around the OnePlus 13 cooled down a bit and it finds itself in ninth this week.

The Samsung Galaxy A16 completes this edition of the chart, but we are certainly expecting some major changes next week as the new Galaxy S series makes its official debut.
